sentences.en: Enclosed is our bill; please remit.
sentences.cn: 随函寄上账单, 请寄款.

sentences.en: God would not remit your sins.
sentences.cn: 上帝不会宽恕你的罪恶.

sentences.en: I promised to remit the balance by the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我答应周末前将余款汇去.

sentences.en: I remit money to my family every month.
Please remit promptly by money order.
sentences.cn: 请速将款项用汇票汇来.

sentences.en: Such decisions are outside the remit of this committee.
sentences.cn: 这样的决定超出了委员会的职权范围。

sentences.en: That issue is not within the remit of the working group.
sentences.cn: 那个问题不在工作组的职权范围之内。

sentences.en: We didn't remit our efforts until we attained our end.
sentences.cn: 在达成目标之前我们未曾松劲.

sentences.en: We have accordingly instructed the Shanghai Bank to remit that amount by telegraphic transfer to you.
sentences.cn: 兹托上海银行电汇上述款项给贵公司.

sentences.en: You will have to remit this problem to a higher authority.
sentences.cn: 你得把这个问题提交给上一级.

words.tran_cn: 怠慢的；迟缓的；不小心的
宽恕；免除；减轻；传送；使恢复原状

trans.tran_cn: 职权范围，控制范围，影响范围

trans.tran_en: to free someone from a debt or punishment
